control.visible: Player.HasMedia + ![Control.HasFocus(510) | Control.HasFocus(5100) | Control.HasFocus(5110) | StringCompare(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),weather) + !Skin.HasSetting(noweatherwidget) | StringCompare(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),settings) + !Skin.HasSetting(nosystemwidget) | Skin.HasSetting(nonowplayingpanel) | Skin.HasSetting(highermainmenu) + Skin.HasSetting(submode)]

animation.condition: [SubString(skin.string(widgetsmode),manual) | SubString(skin.string(widgetsmode),auto) + !Control.IsVisible(9931) | Player.HasMedia + System.IdleTime(8)] + ![Control.HasFocus(510) | Control.HasFocus(520) | Control.HasFocus(5100) | Control.HasFocus(5110)]

control.visible: [StringCompare(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),movies) + Library.HasContent(Movies) | StringCompare(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),tvshows) + Library.HasContent(TVShows) | StringCompare(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),concerts) + Library.HasContent(MusicVideos) | StringCompare(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),music) + Library.HasContent(Music) | StringCompare(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),favourites) + !IsEmpty(Window(0).Property(Favourite.1.Name)) | SubString(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),vpl) | SubString(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),apl)] + ![Player.HasMedia + System.IdleTime(8) | Skin.HasSetting(nohometotals) | Control.HasFocus(510) | Skin.HasSetting(highertotals) + [Window.IsVisible(104) | Window.IsVisible(107) | Library.IsScanningVideo | Library.IsScanningMusic | Window.IsVisible(614)]]
